cgcloud__Org_Unit__c.name: cgcloud__Org_Unit__c
cgcloud__Org_Unit__c.description: Stores the details of the Organization unit object that defines a manufacturer's organizational structure.

cgcloud__Description__c.description: Description based on the user-specified language.

cgcloud__Org_Level__c.description: Level of an organization unit regarding a organization type.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Describes the sales org to which the org unit belongs.
